text.div:
SHR MorphologyBehaviorVS ValueSet

The morphologic behavior of the cancer. These are the suffix to the ICD-O-3 histologic type codes. Codes are presented as local codes due to the lack of a ICD-O-3 terminology server available to the FHIR IG publisher.

name: MorphologyBehaviorVS
title: SHR MorphologyBehaviorVS ValueSet
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative
description: The morphologic behavior of the cancer. These are the suffix to the ICD-O-3 histologic type codes. Codes are presented as local codes due to the lack of a ICD-O-3 terminology server available to the FHIR IG publisher.

concept.display: Malignant, uncertain whether primary or metastatic site
